item.title: Percy Sledge - When a Man Loves a Woman
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Am, Em, F, G7, D7
As performed by Percy Sliedge
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/_iXuaXJSGns
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Background (modified to look like Taylor Swift's "Lover" album cover) is from motionbolt.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Grace VanderWaal - Escape My Mind
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Escape My Mind - Grace VanderWaal
Using the chords: C Cm Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: DU DU DU DU Note play du DU du DU - captials have more accent
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Lover Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key G.
Chords Used: G, D, C, Em, F, Am
As performed by Taylor Swift
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/EV2ie1gNDQs
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Background (modified to look like Taylor Swift's "Lover" album cover) is from motionbolt.com.

item.title: Huey Lewis & The News - Stuck With You
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Keys of C & D.
Chords Used: C, Am7, F, Dm, G, Am, Em, A, D, Bm7
As performed by Huey Lewis and the News.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/FaNEwVl1sR0
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Lynyrd Skynyrd - Free Bird
item.description:
Free Bird by Lynyrd Skynyrd. For educational use. The lyrics video was created by YouTuber Anna Mintz and may be found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vKLJdmR6UGU, I just added the ukulele chords. Chords Used: G, D, Em, F, C (and Bb, but only during the bridge / guitar solo).
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: The Thanksgiving Song - Ukulele Play Along (no lyrics)
item.description:
**The same play along song, but with lyrics, may be found here - https://youtu.be/ch5pyySDpEs .
Now Thank We All Our God (Nun Danket), also known as the Thanksgiving Hymn or the Hymn of Thanksgiving. For educational use. Chords Used: C F Dm G G7 Am Em A
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Simon & Garfunkel - Scarborough Fair / Canticle
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of E Dorian (built on the second step of the D Major scale)
Chords Used: Em, D, G, A
As performed by Simon & Garfunkel
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/M0x_G4eA71w
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The art work is by Pieter Brueghel the Younger (1534-1638) and is entitled "Flemish Fair."
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6

item.title: Bruno Mars - The Lazy Song
item.description:
The Lazy Song by Bruno Mars. It’s been lowered by 4 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. The lyric video was created by YouTuber gizmothing1, I digitally lowered the recording so you can play it without a capo and added the ukulele chord diagrams. The original lyric video may be found here - https://youtu.be/k1_26Iayp1s . For educational use. Chords Used: G C D B7 Am Bm Em
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: You're The One That I Want - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Ukulele play along
You're The One That I Want John Travolta and Olivia Newton-John From the film - GREASE
Using the chords: Am C E7 Em F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or D DU UDU Try doubling the strum speed once you can play it confidently.
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: The Dixie Cups - Chapel Of Love
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of D. (Original Key)
Chords Used: D, Em, A, B7
As performed by The Dixie Cups.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/XNvFL6cqDi0
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Motion background from www.videvo.net.
